constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of single storey side extension
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

In order to calculate the required fee for your pre-planning application please provide the area of the extension in square meters.If the extension is within 99 sq meters the fee required would be Â£600.00 for meeting and advice note. Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002 or by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames. You may also pay online via the RBK website www.kingston.gov.uk

Unless clearly specified otherwise, the base of the development shown on the approved plans is taken to be external ground level, and not a Damp Proof Course or Internal Finished Floor Level. The external ground level is expected to remain consistent before and after construction of the approved development unless specified otherwise on the approved plans.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Suitable minor works to repeat previous level of reduction in order to maintain tree at present size in location.Recommendation:Approve.
